entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 07:00 AM ADT Thursday 28 April 2016
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High zero. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Thursday 28 April 2016
